item.title: Motion Forecasting in Continuous Driving

item.title: Tetrahedron Splatting for 3D Generation
item.description: TeT-Splatting: a novel 3D representation enabling fast convergence, real-time rendering, and precise mesh extraction for high-fidelity 3D generation.
